timeline.message: Oh baby, this is a big one

timeline.bodyText: You should add your name here.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: I'd rather display this on a seperate line (if != null)
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: With "seperate line" I meant an actual seperate line in chat. I think it should be it's own line.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: You write to the cache but never read from it?
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText:
ewwww, Iterable, I think you should rather do it like you did in the other class:
https://github.com/TheBusyBiscuit/Slimefun4/pull/2107/files#diff-3e7b2257540224b37738ee5d7874df07R89-R90
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: I think we should have a failsafe to not lose metrics data.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText:
You made a method for this, so use it :LUL:
hasAutoUpdates()
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.message: Better handling of downloaded files, typo fix and small changes
Merge branch 'feature/metrics-module' of https://github.com/WalshyDev/Slimefun4 into feature/metrics-module

timeline.bodyText: You should probably specify the Reader to use StandardCharsets.UTF_8 here.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Is this method really really necessary here?
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: Necessary? No but useful? yes. This code has changed a lot, it saved a lot of code.
replies.author: WalshyDev

timeline.bodyText: We have a numeric pattern in PatternUtils, would be best to use that here to avoid formatting issues.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Is this method even needed here? Or is it for when someone uses /reload?
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText:
It's to cleanup the class loader, if we didn't close it and a reload happened (or an update to the module) then we may leak classes and these class resources.
This is ran when re-starting (on new version) and onDisable
replies.author: WalshyDev

timeline.bodyText: Also isnt this gonna check for updates twice if it finds one? Since it will re-run that method? Should probably set newlyDownloaded true inside download() to prevent that.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: Err, yeah could save a call.
replies.author: WalshyDev

timeline.bodyText: This line has now become redundant.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Minor thing, but I'd add a # here before the version 🤓
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: With the regex this UNOFFICIAL comparison is actually also redundant now
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Also about this location, we have a cache subfolder in the data folder for all the github files, should we move it there? Then they wont be bothered with this jar sitting inbetween their configs?
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit
TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Should probably also be in the cache/modules folder.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit
